name: INSetTaskAttributeIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for updating the attributes of an existing task.

items.name: func resolveTargetTask(for: INSetTaskAttributeIntent, with: (INTaskResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves which task the user wants to modify.

items.name: func resolveStatus(for: INSetTaskAttributeIntent, with: (INTaskStatusResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the intended status of the task.

items.name: func resolveSpatialEventTrigger(for: INSetTaskAttributeIntent, with: (INSpatialEventTriggerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the location-based trigger to apply to the task.

items.name: func resolveTemporalEventTrigger(for: INSetTaskAttributeIntent, with: (INSetTaskAttributeTemporalEventTriggerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the time-based trigger to apply to the task.

items.name: func resolvePriority(for: INSetTaskAttributeIntent, with: (INTaskPriorityResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the intended priority of the task.

items.name: func resolveTaskTitle(for: INSetTaskAttributeIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the intended title of the task.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSetTaskAttributeIntent, completion: (INSetTaskAttributeIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can modify the taskâ€™s attributes.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSetTaskAttributeIntent, completion: (INSetTaskAttributeIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles the modification of the attributes of a task.
